column2: Rubric – Systematic Literature Review Assignment: Review Protocol
Please do not change the name of this file: it identifies the group.

column3: Task
Submission
Is there a review protocol file?
Is the filename correct (review_protocol.txt)?
Search String
Is the search string syntactically correct?
Is the search string semantically correct (i.e. matches the apparent intent of the search string)?
Is the search string appropriate for the topic and RQ (i.e. will find relevant papers)?
Is the reported number of papers sufficient for a review (more than 20)?
Is the reported number of papers close to the value shown in num_papers.txt?
Inclusion/Exclusion Criteria
Are the inclusion criteria understandable?
Are the inclusion criteria appropriate for a literature review?
Are the inclusion criteria appropriately selective (e.g. don't artificially reduce the number of papers to make the review eaiser)?
Are the exclusion criteria understandable?
Are the exclusion criteria appropriate for a literature review?
Do the exclusion criteria refine the included papers (i.e. are not just a negation of inclusion criteria)?
Presentation
Is the document spelled correctly?
Is the document punctuated correctly (e.g., space(s) after (but not before) commas, semi-colons, colons, and full stops; spaces, full stops, and capitalization consistent throughout)?
Is the document grammatically correct?
Are acronyms, abbreviations, or jargon used?
Are all acronyms, abbreviations, and/or jargon terms defined before use?
Does the document conform to the format in review_protocol.txt (see template in review-protocol directory)?
Is the search string in the right place, between the code block fences (‘~~~~~’)?
General comments
Any general comments? (please use column G for all comments)
